definition: to let matters rest
to concern/to interfere/shield/stem
surname Xiu
to rest/to stop doing sth for a period of time/to cease/(imperative) don't

sentences.english: Stop it or Iham tsimilarg you home right now.
sentences.chinese: 干休做這個，否則我馬上帶你回家。

sentences.english: Logistics is unique, and it never stops!
sentences.chinese: 物流是獨特的，它從不干休。

definition: to leave the matter at that/to be prepared to let go/to be willing to take things lying down
to forgive easily/to let off lightly (often with negative: you won't get away with it)
to push sb too far/to go too far (in oppressing people)
to give up
the two cannot exist together (idiom); irreconcilable differences/incompatible standpoints
witch (esp. European)
(derog.) Buddhist monk
unable to tell good from bad (idiom)/undiscriminating
to bully intolerably (idiom)
to wait helplessly for death (idiom)/to resign oneself to extinction
unable to differentiate good from bad (idiom)/not to know what's good for one/unable to recognize others' good intentions
a traitor/a treacherous bandit
don't blame (sb)
to start a feud/to become enemies
to fight to one's last gasp
the two cannot exist together (idiom); irreconcilable differences/incompatible standpoints
